name: Indifferent Full Length Album
description:
1. Balthasar
2. Worst Day
3. Trophy Wife
4. Merigold
5. Nala
6. East Coast/ West Coast
7. Indifferent

The first full length production and the second studio album of Ticket To Ride, "Indifferent" tells the tales of some young musicians in Pennsylvania that are growing up in a world of confusion and loneliness. The entire album is a concept of a dream from the minute one falls asleep to the minute morning breaks.

Comes with a sheet of lyrics. Shrink wrapped. Full color insert, front and back with a painting by Frazee as the cover. Full tray professional case. 

Recorded at JL Studios on 12/29/10, 1/2/11, 1/3/11 and 1/15/11.
Mixed and Mastered by Joe Loftus and Jay Preston.
Guest Vocals on "Indifferent" by Tim Husty.

name: Northeast PA Pop Punk Shirt
description:
First print of the shirts for the release of the album "Indifferent" and the Winter Tour of 2011. Features the Cpl. bars and cross design surrounded by "Northeast PA Pop Punk" and an olive branch. Design on the back by Frazee.

Maroon, Gildan Heavy Tee, 100% Cotton, Preshrunk. 

And no, the girl does not come with the shirt.
By the way, photo thanks to Colleen Cambier.

name: Baseball Shirt
description:
First print of the shirts for the release of the album "Indifferent" and the Winter Tour of 2011. Inspired by the EdLark teeshirts the band wears. "Larksville, PA" is printed on the flag coming off the band's name. This shirt is great for baseball lovers or for those who think they do. Design on the back by Frazee.

Royal Blue, Gildan Heavy Tee, 100% Cotton, Preshrunk.

name: Arm & Hammer Shirt
description:
First print of the shirts for the release of the album "Indifferent" and the Winter Tour of 2011. Features the arm and hammer design with "Ticket To Ride" as the bicep which holds up the hammer inscribed with "Larksville, PA." This shows local pride. Design on the back by Frazee.

Purple, Gildan Heavy Tee, 100% Cotton, Preshrunk.

name: Cpl. Tom Lives!!! EP
description: These are what's left after the first 7 presses of the EP have run and were sold. The last press will be run for the WinTOUR 2011. Once they're gone, they're gone. Digital music is available at www.TicketToRide.Bandcamp.com /album/cpl-tom-lives This item ships free to the USA. This EP comes with a sheet of lyrics. Shrink wrapped. Full color insert front and back. Limited Edition. 1. There For You 2. The Alone 3. Snowy Rhodes 4. Buzzkill 5. The Price Of Freedom 6. Cpl. Tom Derek Jolley- guitar, lead vocals, piano Danny Washington- bass, vocals Nate Harbaugh- drums, vocals, trumpet Recorded at JL Studios on March 7th, 2010. Mixed and Mastered by Joe Loftus. Guest gang vocals by Joe Loftus and Tony Valunas.
